channel.title: Pompeys Pillar on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pompeys Pillar on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 23
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 23 - Pompeys Pillar. Pompeys Pillar is a sandstone outcrop, that is special because it has a signature of William Clark, from the Lewis and Clark expedition engraved in it. William Clark named Pompeys Pillar after Sacagawea’s infant son Jean Baptiste, whom Clark had nicknamed Pompey.
